casebody.data:
Scott JACOBSON
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided February 20, 2019

Jennifer B. Smith, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Linda F. Currie-Zeffiro, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Scott Jacobson's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 187 Conn. App. 901, 199 A.3d 100 (2019), is denied.
